DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate benefit risk lixisenatide ( AVE0010 ) , comparison placebo , add-on treatment sulfonylurea without metformin , period 24 week treatment , follow extension . The primary objective ass effect lixisenatide add sulfonylurea without metformin glycemic control term glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) reduction ( absolute change ) Week 24 . The secondary objective assess effect lixisenatide percentage patient reach HbA1c le ( < ) 7 percent ( % ) ; percentage patient reach HbA1c le equal ( < = ) 6.5 % ; body weight ; fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) ; beta-cell function assess homeostasis model assessment ( HOMA ) beta ; 2-hour postprandial plasma glucose ( PPG ) , glucagon , insulin , proinsulin , C-peptide standardize meal challenge test sub-study patient select center ; evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) anti-lixisenatide antibody development .
DOC.brief_title: GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Lixisenatide Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Glycemic Control Safety Evaluation , Top Sulfonylurea
DOC.detailed_description: Patients complete 24-week main double-blind treatment would undergo variable double-blind extension treatment , end patient approximately schedule date Week 76 visit ( Visit 25 ) last randomized patient .
